title: CMS - LDN&JRS - BACKUP - ACTIVE CLIENT DONE
time_sequence: CR - CMS ACTIVITIES FLOW CS - CSD SATURDAY ACTIVITIES

task_list.instruction_title:
[ROYER Alain](https://confluence.corp.ubp.ch/display/~aro) Backup of the main databases involved on RUN/DR on the CMS server used for the RUN/DR in a specific folder on D drive at the following steps :
_- Before start of RUN/DR (after Data refresh)
- After  CMS/Secli interface process (middle of migration process)
- After RUN/DR process completed
